short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dyslexicator sets the font of a page to OpenDyslectic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets the font used in web pages to OpenDyslectic; this font is specifically designed for people with dyslexia, and helps with reading texts.

Click on the icon to change the web page font to OpenDyslectic.
Click again to change it back.
